response.original_title: The Foreground - Live at The Center
response.overview: Debuting their latest album, "Reflect, Evolve, Inspire", at their CD Release Party in Sandy, UT at the Center for the Performing Arts.  Performances include: I am the Architect, Life in Suspense, You Had Me Going, Lost and Found, When I'm With You, True North, Who We Are, and Give Me a Chance.  The Foreground is: Jonny Bryant (Vocals), Skitch Bryant (Piano), Kail Ehlers (Bass), and Ampee Figueroa (Drums)
response.title: The Foreground - Live at The Center
